ModMetaData.name: Visible Wealth
ModMetaData.author: 1trickPwnyta
ModMetaData.description:
Did you know that your thrumbofur stockpile makes up a massive portion of your colony's wealth? Did you know that your snowhare corpse is worth $18? Well now you can see a detailed breakdown of your colony's wealth, including all your items, buildings, and pawns. I don't know what else to say.
=== Credits === Mod icon: twitter.com/mouse_draws
